author: vsiveton
msg: Rollback of 760874. See SHINDIG 848 comments for context
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: ate
msg: With the new Pluto 2.0 container API this turned out to be somewhat more complex than anticipated but AFAIK everything now works as before which I have tested against Wicket 1.3.5.
However ... the current Struts Portlet Bridge (1.0.4) is *not* working anymore.
That is not so much caused by the ServletContextProvider implementation but Struts itself using the ServletContext.getRequestDispatcher instead of Request.getRequestDispatcher.
With the new Pluto 2.0, using a request dispatcher from the ServletContext and the fact that now ServletRequest != PortletRequest causes Struts to bypass the container completely
This really can only be fixed by upgrading the Struts Portlet Bridge itself. Until that happens, Struts Bridge based Portlets no longer can run on Jetspeed 2.2

author: ate
msg: Fixing a minor bug in PathInfo mapping concerning *. url patterns.
As those need to be mapped as full path the the servlet (path -> servletPath) which already is the default / catch-all case,
there is  actually no need to keep track of and check against extension mapping url patterns at all.
